gifts.name: Bookshop.org Gift Card
gifts.description: Support indie bookstores with a digital gift card. Bookshop.org is an online bookstore with a mission to financially support local, independent bookstores.

gifts.name: CSA Subscription
gifts.description: Weekly local produce from small farms. Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) connects consumers directly with local farmers, providing fresh, seasonal produce while supporting sustainable agriculture.

gifts.name: Local Coffee Subscription
gifts.description: Monthly delivery of freshly roasted coffee from local roasters. Support small coffee businesses while enjoying high-quality, ethically sourced beans.

gifts.name: Local Cooking Class
gifts.description: Learn to cook with local chefs using seasonal ingredients. A fun experience that supports local culinary talent and teaches valuable skills.

gifts.name: Museum Membership
gifts.description: Annual membership to a local museum or cultural institution. Supports arts and education while providing year-round access to exhibitions and events.

gifts.name: Plant Subscription Box
gifts.description: Monthly delivery of a new houseplant with care instructions. A sustainable way to bring nature indoors and support local plant nurseries.

gifts.name: Local Theater Tickets
gifts.description: Season tickets to a local theater company. Support performing arts in your community while enjoying live entertainment.

gifts.name: Zero Waste Starter Kit
gifts.description: A collection of reusable items to help reduce waste, including bamboo utensils, reusable bags, and stainless steel containers.
